H3.text: who plays eowyn in lord of the rings. Miranda Otto

A4.text: She played the Elf maiden Arwen Undómiel.

A5.text: In Peter Jackson's films The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (2002) and The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003), Éowyn is played by Miranda Otto.
